name: The Real One
description:
The goal is simple: to find the real dot, which constantly changes its position. Your main enemies in this game is your eyes. Eyes will see dots that do not really exist.

There are three modes for each type of player. Find the largest number of points in 60 seconds in the Timed Mode, try to hold on as long as possible in Endless Mode, or relax in Zen Mode. Accumulate points along the way to get power ups.

POWER UPS
- TIME STOP: stops the time for 10 seconds
- WING: shows the closest side to the point
- SPARK: increases the flashing of the point
